scripts.dev: concurrently -n "backend,frontend,ai" -c "yellow,cyan,magenta" "pnpm run dev:backend" "pnpm run dev:frontend" "pnpm run dev:ai"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:backend
scripts.setup: pnpm run setup:deps && pnpm run setup:db && pnpm run setup:ollama
scripts.setup:db: pnpm run db:start && pnpm run db:migrate
scripts.setup:ollama: ollama pull llama2:7b-chat && ollama pull codellama:7b
scripts.test: pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:integration
scripts.systemd:enable: sudo systemctl enable shodo-backend shodo-frontend shodo-ai
scripts.systemd:start: sudo systemctl start shodo-backend shodo-frontend shodo-ai
scripts.systemd:status: sudo systemctl status shodo-backend shodo-frontend shodo-ai
